overview:
Concurrently, Al was directly involved with a number of startup ventures in the web and internet services industry. Al played a key role in visioning and forming the potential and business models for; A web based software for Event Management, innovative Personal Information web based manager, Cool new widget to the promotional market, a unique user privacy platform.

Most recently Al got extensively involved in the Private Equity and private wealth management business. Al has led several operations and companies buyouts and investments for private investors. Al managed the entire process of sourcing, valuations, deals structuring and executing.
